Docs.param: Reference to PortalContext object that contains information about this portal site.
true indicates audience information is stored in a central location; otherwise, false.
true indicates audience information for this site is available to other portal sites; otherwise, false.
Element of the enumeration that indicates the level of access to audience information for this portal site.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified access rights and a reference to a object that represents the current portal site.
